value.name: ‘Steven, you’re gonna get shot’: Bodycam video shows officer fatally shooting homeless man
value.description: Steven John Olson was pronounced dead at a local hospital after being shot multiple times by Officer Chad Moore just after 7 a.m. on April 21 near the intersection of Broadway and Second Avenue.
